summary: Sara, a straight arrow schoolteacher, meets Virgil, an easygoing tattoo artist, and finds herself choosing between her comfortable life and a life of freedom and adventure.
cast: Megan Edwards|Virgil Mignanelli|Benjamin Burdick|Kathryn Cherasaro|Gordon Reinhart|Stitch Marker|Stacey Bean|Stephen F. Davies|Nick Garcia|Tom Willmorth|Ben Larned|Tyler Maier|Christina Lang|E.J. Pettinger|Travis Swartz|Sara Bruner|Gene Bickley|Amy Krengal|Jim Agenbroad|Eryn Spaeth|Ariel Spaeth|Gus Pollio|Phil Atlakson|Flint Weisser|Mark Salow|Kate Miller|Jacelyn Anderson|Michelle Waddell|Grant Lawley|Cindy Migninelli|Jessyca Harrold|Angie Lachapelle|Nick Halfrich|Curtis Stigers|Dave Yasuda|Carlie Powell|India Allen|Walker Ragan|Jordan Gore|Joel Hawkins|Tre Bradshaw
title: Tattoo, a Love Story
